wordGroup: in allusion to 针对；引喻

sentences.en: Her poetry is full of obscure literary allusion.
sentences.cn: 她的诗随处可见晦涩的文学典故。

sentences.en: His statement was seen as an allusion to the recent drug-related killings.
sentences.cn: 他的声明被视为暗指最近与毒品有关的多起凶杀案。

sentences.en: This last point was understood to be an allusion to the long-standing hostility between the two leaders.
sentences.cn: 这最后一点曾被理解为对这两位领导人之间长久敌意的一种影射。
